Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In addition , the excitability of the cardiac conduction system was depressed preferentially in the atrioventricular nodal region of hearts from barium - exposed rats .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| cardiac conduction system |

The "cardiac conduction system" is the only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph. It is a system within the heart that coordinates the electrical signals that cause it to beat. In this case, the excitability of this system was depressed in the atrioventricular nodal region of hearts from barium-exposed rats.

| --- |
| cardiac conduction system |

The only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is "cardiac conduction system". Other terms such as "barium-exposed rats" and "atrioventricular nodal region" refer to the experimental conditions and the location of the effect, respectively, and do not clearly refer to a disease.
